title: Ana Criado - Ever True (2014) (320kbps) (AciDToX8)
description:
Ana Criado - Ever True (2014) 

          Trance, Vocal, Melodic, Progressive | Amsterdam Trance Records  

             320 kbps | MP3 | unmixed | 2014-12-08 | 01:34:46 | 218 Mb


Ana Criado's songs are more vulnerable than butterfly wings. In her English ballads, the half Spanish, half British singer-songwriter requires only simple words and simple meanings combined with some well thought-out notes to tell her story. Nowhere does she need to raise her voice to deliver the feelings. The moments of silence in each of her three songs hit hard. Ana Criado (Critically acclaimed by Oor) is currently studying songwriting at the Tilburg Rockacademy. To give her work a finishing touch she cooperated with composer J.
